input.sentences: we started off our day with a yummy breakfast burrito .
then we went sightseeing on the bridge .
we passed by the fresh farmer 's market and bought lots of fruit .
here are two of the friends that accompanied me .
we ended the night by going to a singing show .
output.sentences: This wrap was yummy and started my day off right.
Later I went sightseeing at this bridge.
On the way I passed fresh markets in the parking lots.
One of my friends accompanied me.
Later, we listed to some live singing at night.
